verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Alone by the fire, a warrior I knew Told me this tale, and I pray it is true.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: From far Ansteorra our dragon-ship came To fight for good Halidar on Lilied plain My sword I had lent seeking honor and fame Or Odin's great hall in the fray

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We charged into battle, the sun beating high Our battle-horns sounding a victory nigh Our spears crossed their arrows like hawks in the sky Leaving many men dead on the way

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Sing me no songs of angels I pray For a Valkyrie found me in battle that day

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The battle was long and the sun was like fire The heat drove us down like a funeral pyre Though many I'd slain, now my bloodlust did tire Struck down by the heat of the day

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The battle moved onward from where I was laid I drew of my helmet to rest in the shade When a soft even tread, like the wind in a glade Brought a daughter of Asgard my way

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: She gave me cool drink 'till my wits came again Be fore I could speak she was gone like the wind Had I but died, I could follow her then But I lay with the living that day

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Long I did search, a full year I have mourned And told all my brothers this love I have borne But she is of Asgard, and I of this shore So here with my brothers I stay

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: True to this dream like the tale I have told Close to my heart, a small pouch I still hold And in it a lock of her hair pure as gold This I carry to battle this day
